name: Amna Amir
description:
Hey there! My name is Amna, and I'm currently pursuing my bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am a passionate student who loves coding and constantly learning new things in the world of technology.I find immense joy in solving problems, creating solutions, and continually expanding my knowledge.
One of my favorite shers that inspires me and reflects my life motto is:
quote:
چاند کی طرف پرواز کرو
اگر تم چاند تک نہ پہنچ سکے تو
ستاروں کو ضرور چھو لو گے
